name: Telegram Cloud Uploads Manager Bot
description: A Telegram Cloud Uploads Manager Bot by @AbirHasan2005

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

STREAMTAPE_API_USERNAME.description: Streamtape API Username. Get this from https://streamtape.com/accpanel#collapseThree

STREAMTAPE_API_PASS.description: Streamtape API Password. Get this from https://streamtape.com/accpanel#collapseThree

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Logs Channel ID for some Tracking XD. Example: -100123456789
